(net.ipv4.ip_forward = 0)", "ruleId": "5971bbd2-1977-4652-bd85-a38a8f780052" }, { "msid": "40.1", "result": "PASS", "error_text": "", "cceid": "CCE-4236-6", "severity": "Critical", "description": "Accepting source routed packets should be disabled for all interfaces. (net.ipv4.icmp_echo_ignore_broadcasts = 1)", "ruleId": "f5a5926d-9c64-41fa-8220-5bc0f8213550" }, { "msid": "46.1", "result": "FAIL", "error_text": "File /proc/sys/net/ipv4/conf/all/rp_filter should contain one or more lines matching ['^1$']", "cceid": "CCE-4080-8", "severity": "Critical", "description": "Performing source validation by reverse path should be enabled for all interfaces. "ruleId": "083550af-f4fe-4e1a-a304-dac894d58908" }, { "msid": "90", "result": "PASS", "error_text": "", "cceid": "CCE-4324-0", "severity": "Critical", "description": "The crond service should be enabled.", "ruleId": "80302f61-d760-4165-a92b-a789e579380f" }, { "msid": "91", "result": "PASS", "error_text": "", "cceid": "CCE-4304-2", "severity": "Critical", "description": "File permissions for /etc/anacrontab should be set to root:root 600.", "ruleId": "8199ae98-8d9c-4a26-88ca-e6d9b87d3644" }, { "msid": "106.1", "result": "FAIL", "error_text": "File /etc/ssh/sshd_config should contain one or more lines matching ['^[\\s\\t]*Protocol\\s+2$']", "cceid": "CCE-4325-7", "severity": "Critical", "description": "SSH must be configured and managed to meet best practices. - '/etc/ssh/sshd_config Protocol = 2'", "ruleId": "35868e8c-97eb-4981-ab79-99b25101cc86" }, { "msid": "106.3", "result": "FAIL", "error_text": "File /etc/ssh/sshd_config should contain one or more lines matching ['^[\\s\\t]*IgnoreRhosts\\s+yes']", "cceid": "CCE-4030-3", "severity": "Critical", "description": "SSH must be configured and managed to meet best practices. - '/etc/ssh/sshd_config IgnoreRhosts = yes'", "ruleId": "43945588-1bdc-495c-bac8-6a71a62d30aa" }, { "msid": "107", "result": "FAIL", "error_text": "File /etc/ssh/sshd_config should contain one or more lines matching ['^[\\s\\t]*RhostsRSAAuthentication\\s+no']", "cceid": "CCE-4475-0", "severity": "Critical", "description": "Emulation of the rsh command through the ssh server should be disabled. - '/etc/ssh/sshd_config RhostsRSAAuthentication = no'", "ruleId": "c0b75409-01e3-4428-9a32-bfcdb42afcb5" }, { "msid": "108", "result": "FAIL", "error_text": "File /etc/ssh/sshd_config should contain one or more lines matching ['^[\\s\\t]*HostbasedAuthentication\\s+no']", "cceid": "CCE-4370-3", "severity": "Critical", "description": "SSH host-based authentication should be disabled. - '/etc/ssh/sshd_config HostbasedAuthentication = no'", "ruleId": "66511f6b-f690-43df-9654-642260699eec" }, { "msid": "110", "result": "FAIL", "error_text": "File /etc/ssh/sshd_config should contain one or more lines matching ['^[\\s\\t]*PermitEmptyPasswords\\s+no']", "cceid": "CCE-3660-8", "severity": "Critical", "description": "Remote connections from accounts with empty passwords should be disabled. - '/etc/ssh/sshd_config PermitEmptyPasswords = no'", "ruleId": "d50c3f39-264c-4cdc-b0ba-89de8a0f6828" }, { "msid": "112", "result": "PASS", "error_text": "", "cceid": "CCE-14716-5",
